NAME: ltbi.prev
DESCRIPTION: Prevalence of LTBI in residents

NAME: prog.tb
DESCRIPTION: Progression risk from LTBI to TB disease

NAME: prop.tb.sympt.screen
DESCRIPTION: Verbal TB symptom screening within 48 hours of arrival
SOURCE: Calculated using data from prison pilots

NAME: prop.previous.tb.started.att
DESCRIPTION: Past TB diagnosis, started anti-TB treatment

NAME: prop.prev.tb.dx.continue.att
DESCRIPTION: Attending NHS TB services referral & continue anti-TB treatment

NAME: prop.prev.tb.dx.still.on.att
DESCRIPTION: Past TB diagnosis, started & still on anti-TB treatment

NAME: sens.symptom
DESCRIPTION: Sensitivity for any TB symptom (cough, haemoptysis, fever, night sweats, weight loss) for screening for TB disease

NAME: spec.symptom
DESCRIPTION: Specificity for any TB symptom (cough, haemoptysis, fever, night sweats, weight loss) for screening for TB disease

NAME: sens.any.abn.xray
DESCRIPTION: Sensitivity of chest radiography (any abnormality) for screening for TB disease

NAME: spec.any.abn.xray
DESCRIPTION: Specificty of chest radiography (any abnormality) for screening for TB disease

NAME: sens.xpert
DESCRIPTION: Sensitivity of Xpert MTB/RIF Utra for pulmonary TB in adults

NAME: spec.xpert
DESCRIPTION: Specificty of Xpert MTB/RIF Utra for pulmonary TB in adults

NAME: prop.prison.gp.assessment
DESCRIPTION: Past TB diagnosis, started & completed anti-TB treatment, with TB symptoms, Prison GP assessment

NAME: prop.clinical.tb.suspicion
DESCRIPTION: Clinical TB suspicion

NAME: prop.xray
DESCRIPTION: Proportion of residents receiving a chest xray
SOURCE: Calculated using data from prison pilots

NAME: prop.attend.nhs.referral
DESCRIPTION: Proportion attending NHS TB services referral

NAME: prop.igra.tested
DESCRIPTION: Received IGRA test
SOURCE: Calculated using data from prison pilots

NAME: prop.igra.test.positive
DESCRIPTION: Positive IGRA test
SOURCE: Calculated using data from prison pilots

NAME: prop.starting.att
DESCRIPTION: Starting anti-tuberculosis treatment

NAME: prop.completing.att
DESCRIPTION: Completing anti-tuberculosis treatment

NAME: nContacts
DESCRIPTION: Number of contacts examined per primary case

NAME: prop.starting.tpt
DESCRIPTION: Starting tuberculosis preventive therapy

NAME: prop.completing.tpt
DESCRIPTION: Completing tuberculosis preventive therapy

NAME: verbal_screen_time
DESCRIPTION: Time taken to verbal screen on reception into prison

NAME: pIsolation
DESCRIPTION: Proportion†of†prisoners†isolated†in†single†cells

NAME: DurMDRTBfactor
DESCRIPTION: Multiplier for MDR-TB treatment duration as a function of DS TB treatment duration

NAME: IncompTxfactor
DESCRIPTION: Multiplier for non-completers treatment duration as a function of completers

NAME: DurMDRTB2Isolation
DESCRIPTION: Duration†of†negative-pressure†isolation†(smear-positive†MDR†TB)

NAME: DurMDRTBIsolation
DESCRIPTION: Duration†of†non-isolation†inpatient†(smear-negative†MDR†TB)

NAME: DurDSTBIsolation
DESCRIPTION: Duration†of†standard†inpatient isolation

NAME: pDSTB
DESCRIPTION: Proportion of DSTB (Not resistant to any first line drug)
SOURCE: Calculated using data from TB diagnosis, microbiology and drug resistance in England, 2021

NAME: smear.positive
DESCRIPTION: Proportion of sputum smear positive
SOURCE: Assumed based on Any test positive from TB diagnosis, microbiology and drug resistance in England, 2021
